items.badge_description: While spontaneity can be fun, sometimes you want to make sure your adventure will rock. Checkout the menu at an Untappd Verified Venue before visiting and know exactly what’s on tap! That's 500 check-ins at venue that is verified. You have reached the top!

You may not be able to see through the haze, but that juicy, hoppy goodness goes down smooth. What started as a trend is here to stay. That's 50 different beers with the style of IPA - New England / Hazy, Pale Ale - New England / Hazy, IPA - Milkshake, or Pale Ale - Milkshake. Try 5 more for Level 11!

It takes the perfect amount of light, the right framing and a touch of creative love to get the perfect picture of your brew. Now it’s time to drink it! That's 405 check-ins with a photo.  Try 5 more for Level 82!

items.comment: Jerry J. Next time indeed. I totally should have thought to message. It was an AI sponsored happy hour.

items.badge_description: American Craft Beer Week is May 16–22. We’re biased, but we believe American craft beer is worth celebrating. Let's raise a glass and toast. Are you with us!? Find a local craft brewery near you.
It's New Brew Thursday! Drink any beer you have never had before on three different Thursdays in a 20 day period.

Looking for more kick than a session beer, but want to be able to stay for a few rounds? You have to keep it in the middle. That's 460 beers with an ABV greater than 5% and less than 10%.  Try 5 more for Level 93!
We believe in IPA and you should too. You certainly have a taste for the hops! That's 5 different IPAs. Try 5 more for Level 22! Want to learn more about this badge? Check out our podcast

At first taste, dark ales can be overwhelming for even the most skilled of beer drinkers, but your will is weak and with time you will eventually turn to the dark side. That's 5 different beers with the style of Dark Ale, Belgian Strong Dark Ale, Lager - Dark, IPA - Black / Cascadian Dark Ale or IPA - Imperial / Double Black, Schwarzbier, or Mild - Dark. Try 5 more for Level 2!

Looking for more kick than a session beer, but want to be able to stay for a few rounds? You have to keep it in the middle. That's 455 beers with an ABV greater than 5% and less than 10%.  Try 5 more for Level 92!

Hell yea helles! This traditional German pale lager is typically full-bodied, mildly sweet, and light-colored, making it a perfect go to for any occasion. That's 10 different beers with the style of Lager - Helles or Bock - Maibock / Heller (Helles) / Lentebock. Try 5 more for Level 3!

There's beer in them thar hills! You're setting off on your journey through the world of beer, but be sure to take a little time to get to know each brewery as you go. That's a beer from 190 different breweries. Try 5 more for Level 39!

Sometimes you need a break from all the hops, fruits, and spices. What better way than with a crisp, smooth Blonde Ale or Golden Ale? Basic but delicious. That's 15 different beers with the style of Blonde Ale or Golden Ale. Try 5 more for Level 4!
After a long day, what better way to kick back than with a crisp and refreshing lager? You're already feeling more relaxed, aren't you?. That's 70 different Lagers! Try 5 more to unlock Level 15.

Hiking, fishing, swimming - there are so many wonderful things to do while you enjoy the great outdoors. Even beer is better when surrounded by the beauty of nature. That's 10 different venues categorized as Great Outdoors. Visit 5 more for Level 3!

Thanks for staying at home, and checking in with Untappd! It allows us to stay connected to a community of beer lovers, just like you, even if we can't be in the same physical location. From our home to yours, cheers and stay safe!

It's time to give bottle shops some love by adding them as your purchased location. That's 215 check-ins with a purchased location! Tag 5 more to get to Level 44. Want to learn more about this badge? Check out our podcast

Looking for more kick than a session beer, but want to be able to stay for a few rounds? You have to keep it in the middle. That's 450 beers with an ABV greater than 5% and less than 10%.  Try 5 more for Level 91!

Fresh from the tap is one of the best ways to enjoy a beer. Just try to use a glass and not drink directly from the tap, as tempting as it may be. That's 310 checkins with the serving style of Draft. Try 5 more for Level 63!

While spontaneity can be fun, sometimes you want to make sure your adventure will rock. Checkout the menu at an Untappd Verified Venue before visiting and know exactly what’s on tap! That's 490 check-ins at venue that is verified.  Try 5 more for Level 99!

It takes the perfect amount of light, the right framing and a touch of creative love to get the perfect picture of your brew. Now it’s time to drink it! That's 400 check-ins with a photo.  Try 5 more for Level 81!

items.checkin_comment: Usually not a coffee beer person, but this is one I actually can tolerate and like. I believe the raspberry helps to offset the coffee.

items.comment: I got this a few weeks ago when I was down there helping my parents move. They bought a place in Lewes.

items.badge_description: Looking for more kick than a session beer, but want to be able to stay for a few rounds? You have to keep it in the middle. That's 445 beers with an ABV greater than 5% and less than 10%.  Try 5 more for Level 90!

items.checkin_comment: I've been looking forward to this one since it was mentioned in the Maryland Beer Drinkers Club. I'm getting tropical hazy IPA notes followed by maltiness afterward. This is a nice rendition of the style.

items.badge_description: While spontaneity can be fun, sometimes you want to make sure your adventure will rock. Checkout the menu at an Untappd Verified Venue before visiting and know exactly what’s on tap! That's 485 check-ins at venue that is verified.  Try 5 more for Level 98!

Canning is all the rage and it's not hard to see why - travels well, more environmentally friendly, and no need to carry your bottle opener. That's 210 checkins with the serving style of Can. Try 5 more for Level 43! Want to learn more about this badge? Check out our podcast

items.checkin_comment: Nice orange on the nose and taste followed by the coconut after. The fruit additions are not too overpowering, making for a refreshing beer on a nice spring day. Thanks for the recommendation Jerry J.

items.badge_description: Thanks for staying at home, and checking in with Untappd! It allows us to stay connected to a community of beer lovers, just like you, even if we can't be in the same physical location. From our home to yours, cheers and stay safe!
Ahh, the trusty pale ale; crisp, refreshing, and always a good choice in a bind. That's 65 different Pale Ales or American Pale Wheats. Try 5 more for Level 14.
